Introduction

Mashiro is a Japanese singer and dancer under 143 Entertainment. In 2021, Mashiro participated in the MNET survival show Girls Planet 999 where she finished 8th place, securing her spot as a member of the South Korean project girl group Kep1er.

Mashiro debuted as a member of Kep1er on January 3, 2022, with their first mini-album "First Impact" and the title track "WA DA DA."

In June 2024 it was announced Mashiro's contract expired with WAKEONE and she would be leaving Kep1er alongside fellow 143 Entertainment member, Yeseo.

She is now part of 143 Entertainment's new girl group MADEIN which debuted on September 3, 2024 with their first EP "Rise".
